mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT DISTINCT T.SCATEGORY,N.CNT,T.TYPE FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) JOIN (SELECT SCATEGORY, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ITEM JOIN ITEM_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) GROUP BY SCATEGORY) N ON (T.SCATEGORY = N.SCATEGORY) ORDER BY T.SCATEGORY ASC)

SELECT DISTINCT T.SCATEGORY,N.CNT,T.TYPE FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) JOIN (SELECT SCATEGORY, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ITEM JOIN ITEM_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) GROUP BY SCATEGORY) N ON (T.SCATEGORY = N.SCATEGORY) ORDER BY T.SCATEGORY ASC

SELECT T.LCATEGORY,T.MCATEGORY,T.SCATEGORY,I.INO,I.INAME,I.AMOUNT*I.UNIT AS CNT,I.VOS,I.VAT,I.UP,I.MFG,C.CN_NAME,S.STRG_NAME,A.AREA_NAME,R.RM_NUM AS RM_NO,T.TYPE FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) JOIN CONN C ON (C.CN_CODE = I.CN_CODE) LEFT JOIN ROOM R ON (I.RM_NO=R.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN STRG_AREA A ON (A.AREA_NO = I.AREA_NO) LEFT JOIN STRG S ON (A.STRG_NO = S.STRG_NO) WHERE SCATEGORY =#{sCategory}
SELECT RPT_NO,RPT_TITLE,RPT_STATUS FROM REP_REQ R JOIN REPORT USING(RPT_NO)
